ch.randelshofer.quaqua.util

Class Images.GraphiteFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.image.ImageFilter
      • java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
        • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.util.Images.GraphiteFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageConsumer, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    Images

    public static class Images.GraphiteFilter
extends java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
    The graphite filter converts Mac OS X artwork from "Blue Appearance" to "Graphite Appearance" by desaturing the colors.
